objects.specification: A large fair booth with a spacious floor designed to comfortably accommodate a demo car with ample walking space on all sides. The booth features four sturdy walls painted in a neutral light color and includes a wide entrance centered at the front to invite visitors. The interior has a smooth, durable flooring surface with a subtle texture to guide foot traffic. The overall aesthetic is modern and minimalistic, using clean lines and cohesive materials to create an open and welcoming exhibit space.

A high-quality demo car model with detailed exterior featuring smooth aerodynamic curves, glossy metallic paintwork, realistic tires with textured tread patterns, transparent windows, and subtle interior detailing visible through the glass. The car is rendered in a premium finish with intricate grill and headlight designs to attract visitor attention.

A rectangular registration desk with a sleek modern design, featuring a white high-gloss top surface and integrated storage compartments below. The desk has clean straight edges and subtle metal accents at the corners. It is designed at ergonomic height for comfortable visitor interaction and branding signage can be applied to the front panel.

A set of three display stands arranged evenly along the wall, each stand is a slender rectangular pedestal with a smooth top platform for showcasing car parts or brochures. Constructed from polished composite material with a matte finish, the stands have minimalist geometric form and integrated cable management channels.

children.specification: A slender rectangular pedestal style display stand with a flat top platform for brochures or car parts, finished in high-gloss white with clean minimalistic lines and concealed support structure.
A slender rectangular pedestal style display stand with a flat top platform for brochures or car parts, finished in high-gloss white with clean minimalistic lines and concealed support structure.

objects.specification: Multiple rectangular banners hanging from the ceiling inside the booth featuring vibrant car-related graphics, high-resolution printed artwork on lightweight fabric with reinforced top and bottom edges. The banners have integrated mounting hardware and are designed to hang flat without curling or swinging.

children.specification: A rectangular fabric banner with vivid car graphics, durable lightweight material, and hemmed edges for a crisp flat display.
A rectangular fabric banner with vivid car graphics, durable lightweight material, and hemmed edges for a crisp flat display.

objects.specification: A set of ceiling-mounted adjustable spotlights designed to illuminate the demo car area with focused beams. Each spotlight has a sleek metal housing, pivoting head, integrated LED light source, and heat-dissipating fins.

children.specification: An adjustable metal spotlight with a conical head and a strong directional LED beam, featuring a matte finish housing and integrated swivel mount.
An adjustable metal spotlight with a conical head and a strong directional LED beam, featuring a matte finish housing and integrated swivel mount.

objects.specification: A visitor seating area composed of a small round table and four chairs arranged evenly around it, designed for comfort and social interaction. The furniture uses coordinated materials and color palette to match the booth aesthetic.

children.specification: A small round table with a lightly textured wooden top and slender metal legs finished in matte black, providing a stable surface for cups and brochures.
A modern visitor chair with cushioned seat and backrest upholstered in durable fabric, metal frame, and slightly angled back for ergonomic support.
A modern visitor chair with cushioned seat and backrest upholstered in durable fabric, metal frame, and slightly angled back for ergonomic support.

objects.specification: A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and a modern cylindrical planter in matte finish. The plant has varied leaf shapes and heights to add natural visual interest to the booth corners.

A wall-mounted LED screen displaying high-definition car videos, with a slim bezel and matte anti-glare finish. The screen features integrated mounting brackets and flush installation for a clean look.
